accounts.name: iRedeemPool
docs: Stores SOL, accumulated and unstaked vault rewards redeemed from here

accounts.name: jRedeemPool
docs: Stores SOL, unstaked vault assets redeemed from here

accounts.name: solHoldingPool
docs: SOL is held here during warmup. This is the owner
of the mSOL holding pool, and the beneficiary
of the order unstake operation, before dividing
unstaked assets to i and j redeem pools.

accounts.name: msolHoldingPool
docs: Staked mSOL stored here during active phase

accounts.name: solFeeWallet
docs: Warmup and redeem pool fees

accounts.name: msolFeeWallet
docs: Active phase fees, mSOL

accounts.name: msolState
docs: Marinade account used for CPI

accounts.name: vaultInfo
docs: Vault PDA

accounts.name: iMint
docs: Reward receipt token

accounts.name: jMint
docs: Stake receipt token

accounts.name: msolMint
docs: Marinade account used for CPI

accounts.name: iTo
docs: Depositor's i-mint account

accounts.name: jTo
docs: Depositor's j-mint account

accounts.name: solHoldingPool
docs: SOL is held here during warmup. This is the owner
of the mSOL holding pool, and the beneficiary
of the order unstake operation, before dividing
unstaked assets to i and j redeem pools.

accounts.name: msolHoldingPool
docs: Staked mSOL stored here during active phase

docs: Signer for MintTo instructions of j_mint.

docs: Marinade account used for CPI

accounts.name: executor
docs: Signing, fee-paying, permissionless executor of this operation.

accounts.name: vaultInfo
docs: The vault to crank into Unstaking phase

accounts.name: msolState
docs: PDA that stores mSOL state

accounts.name: executor
docs: Signing, fee-paying, unpermissioned executor of this operation.

accounts.name: vaultInfo
docs: The vault whose lifecycle will be advanced into the expired phase.

accounts.name: iRedeemPool
docs: Destination of the vault staking rewards.

accounts.name: jRedeemPool
docs: Destination of the vault staked assets.

accounts.name: solHoldingPool
docs: Beneficiary of the claim ticket. From here, the
SOL is apportioned out to the I and J redeem pools.

accounts.name: claimTicket
docs: The claim ticket for the unstaking operation that takes place
during [crank_unstaked].

accounts.name: msolState
docs: Marinade account for CPI

accounts.name: reservePda
docs: Marinade account for CPI

accounts.name: JAuthority
docs: Signs for J operations on behalf of the program.
Since J-mint and related operations operate across vaults,
no single vault_info can own it. Instead, we need a common owner.

fields.name: jRedeemPool
docs: Stores base_mint redeemable for burning j_mint

fields.name: jMint
docs: Staked asset receipt mint

fields.name: feeWallet
docs: Destination wallet for fees collected on redeem instructions.

fields.name: feeRate
docs: Fee rate, percentage.

fields.name: vaultAuthority
docs: The program administrator that can sign for edits to this vault

fields.name: activePhaseStartTimestamp
docs: SSBOE for when the vault enters Active phase

fields.name: activePhaseEndTimestamp
docs: SSBOE for when the vault leaves Active phase and enters Expired phase

fields.name: iMint
docs: Rewards mint

fields.name: jMint
docs: Staked asset receipt mint

fields.name: msolMint
docs: Msol mint TODO: this can be hardcoded and removed from pda

fields.name: jAuthority
docs: PDA signer for minting j_mint

fields.name: lifecyclePhase
docs: The vault's current lifecycle phase, updated via Crank instruction

fields.name: solFeeWallet
docs: Destination wallet for fees collected on redeem instructions.

fields.name: msolFeeWallet
docs: Destination wallet for fees collected on redeem instructions.

fields.name: feeRate
docs: Fee rate, percentage.

fields.name: iRedeemPool
docs: Stores base_mint redeemable for burning i_mint

fields.name: jRedeemPool
docs: Stores base_mint redeemable for burning j_mint

fields.name: solHoldingPool
docs: Temporary holding pool for warmup phase

fields.name: msolHoldingPool
docs: Staked mSOL stored here during active phase

fields.name: jMintedThisLifecycle
docs: Amount staked in the vault during the current lifecycle

fields.name: msolState
docs: PDA that stores mSOL state

fields.name: msolPerMegasolInitial
docs: How many msol lamports 1_000 sol is worth at the start of the current lifecycle's active phase

fields.name: claimTicket
docs: Order Unstake claim ticket

errors.name: InvalidFeeRate
errors.msg: Invalid fee rate or fee rate decimals

errors.name: DepositOnExpiredVault
errors.msg: Cannot perform user deposit on expired vault

errors.name: RedeemIAndJOnExpiredVault
errors.msg: Cannot perform withdrawal from staking on expired vault

errors.name: WithdrawAmountTooSmall
errors.msg: Amount is too small to perform withdrawal

errors.name: ISupplyNotEmptyStakePoolEmpty
errors.msg: Cannot perform deposit because i-Supply isn't empty but stake pool is empty

errors.name: ISupplyEmptyStakePoolNotEmpty
errors.msg: Cannot perform deposit because i-Supply is empty but stake pool isn't empty
